title: Why i didnt recived my icon? :s
body:
i thought that if you win doombots, thing that i did, i'll recive a teemo icon but i didnt recived nothing :s why that? 
btw i'm pretty sure that i won few times that doombots
what i can do now? pls help :s

replies.body: It will take up to 2 weeks after the event ended (so November 17) for the icons to be added to your account.
so i need to wait? :/ well ty
Yes, as there are **a ton of players** that these icons have to get out to. As much as we'd like to, we cannot simply snap our fingers to deliver the icons to everyone. :P
